author: mrglavas
msg: Moving DOM support up to DOM Level 3.

author: mrglavas
msg: Moving SAX support up to SAX 2.0.2.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding in stubs for getFeature/setFeature so that the code compiles with JAXP 1.3.

author: mrglavas
msg: Updating the release plan.  Setting June 24th as the tentative release date for Xerces 2.7.0.

author: mrglavas
msg: There's boolean which tracks whether a complex type is abstract.
We were only setting it to true, so if a type is not abstract but
this field's value was already set to true during another
call of traverseComplexTypeDecl we were treating the type
as abstract. Should be fixed now.
